sections.heading: Noncompliance not to affect validity of loan6-948
sections.text: Noncompliance not to affect validity of loanA failure to comply with the provisions of this article does not affect the validity or enforceability of any debt or any mortgage, deed of trust or lien interest on real estate. A person acquiring a mortga
